description: All fine overall. But no touch screen support whatsoever in the age of 2-in-1s is not nice
This is a client to a free commercial service with no well-defined business model. The application won't work without logging in.
summary: Description is confusing, not a stand alone application

description:
Yeah, guys don't encrypt notes and honestly warn about it.

But everything else - amazing. The app is minimal ( as I like ), syncing is very fast, nice grouping by tags, and so on. It's cross platform, works on the phone as well. Awesome!

Whilst the app itself is pretty nice and simple, when you sync your notes they're not encrypted on their servers so it's very bad for privacy and security. The developers have even said themselves not to store sensitive information with SimpleNote.
summary: Notes are unencrypted when stored on their servers

description: Simple, clean, fast, reliable. I've been using Simplenote for a decade probably, and it's still my favorite
This version of Simplenote lacks a spellcheck feature, even though this issue has been submitted to the developer's GitHub in 2016.
wayland + hidpi combination makes app blurry and unusable

This note taking application works well, has an intuitive interface and you can insert a checklist in a note. I can arrange notes by date or name. However, you can not insert images nor format text. Another drawback is that I have to be signed in for sync to work.

It's a bag because of when it can happen, and it will just happen that synchronization erases huge parts of your notes. Don't use it for anything more serious than making a shopping list, and it's too unreliable for that also.

Eine sehr einfache und simple Notiz-Anwendung mit Sync-Funktion, wodurch sie auch auf anderen Geräten und Betriebssystemen parallel genutzt werden kann.

Endlich ist diese auch bei Flatpak angekommen :-)
Ich mag diese Anwendung. Es lassen sich einfach neue Notizen erstellen, die dann dank Synchronisation auf allen anderen Geräten abgerufen und bearbeitet werden können.

Es una app de notas que se caracteriza por su simpleza. Tiene sincronización entre dispositivos (la uso también en Android). 
Hace tiempo que uso la versión Flatpak/Flathub y no me ha dado problemas.

Une application super bien faite, un peu lourde (electron bien sûr) mais ça lui permet d'être plutôt complète pour ce que je lui demande.

La synchronisation surtout est très rapide et surtout transparente, jamais aucun problème avec.
summary: Super app de prise de notes !
